thread.title: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger bemoans Francis Coquelin loss as hamstring issue rules midfielder out for weeks
thread.title_full: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger bemoans Francis Coquelin loss as hamstring issue rules midfielder out for weeks

author: Jack Rathborn
title: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger bemoans Francis Coquelin loss as hamstring issue rules midfielder out for weeks
text:
Sport Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger bemoans Francis Coquelin loss as hamstring issue rules midfielder out for weeks The Gunners star will have a scan today to determine the full extent of the injury after being removed 28 minutes into the 3-3 draw with Bournemouth Share Francis Coquelin after injuring himself against Bournemouth (Photo: Rex Features) Share Get Arsenal FC   
Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger has revealed Francis Coquelin will miss several weeks with a hamstring injury in a fresh blow to the Gunners' title bid. 
The tough-tackling French midfielder limped off after 28 minutes in the 3-3 draw at Bournemouth midweek. 
The injury means Coquelin could miss up to five games, though Wenger explained a scan later today will determine exactly how long he will be out for. 
â€œHe is out for three or four weeks now," Wenger revealed. "He has a hamstring problem. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
